projects.name: Cleaners Service
projects.subTitle: Squeaky Clean Landing Page
projects.description: A Next.js & React commercial website crafted with Material-UI for a sleek, professional design.

projects.name: Football Academy Landing Page
projects.subTitle: Showcasing Football Academy Services
projects.description: A dynamic landing page showcasing the football academy's services, built with Actercity-UI for a polished, professional look.

projects.name: Synagogue Bookkeeping
projects.subTitle: Local Synagogue Management WebApp
projects.description: A full-stack web app (pro bono) for managing a local synagogue, built with Next.js, React, and MongoDB, featuring an admin panel. Hosted on AWS.

projects.name: Movies Subscriptions
projects.subTitle: Movie Subscription Management
projects.description: A full-stack web app built with React and Node.js/WebAPI for managing movie subscriptions. It includes user authentication and dynamic management features. Users can search, add, edit, and delete subscriptions.

projects.name: Shifts Organizer
projects.subTitle: Effortlessly Organize Shifts & Schedules
projects.description: A Next.js & React project built with Redux for faster user interaction, featuring an Atlas MongoDB database. Itâ€™s a free-to-use tool designed to streamline shift scheduling.

projects.name: Score Predictor
projects.subTitle: Predict Scores for Euro 2024 Championship
projects.description: Built with React & Next.js with Redux, this app lets you play with friends and predict scores for each match. Can you predict the future?

projects.name: Events Management WebApp
projects.subTitle: Full-stack Project for Event Management
projects.description: A full-stack web application using React & Next.js, with an Express server and MongoDB database. The mobile-friendly web app is built with SCSS and Tailwind.

projects.name: Live Scores WebApp
projects.subTitle: Live Results & Fixtures via Rapid API
projects.description: A Next.js & React project that serves live football match data worldwide. Users can set their favorite leagues and personalize theme colors.

projects.name: Factory Management System
projects.subTitle: Manage Factory Employees & Departments
projects.description: A JS Vanilla project for managing factory employees, shifts, and departments. Database powered by SQL, hosted on a .NET server.
